trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGME113_04944_SEQ_00<tab>Cahciua wishes to hold a strategy meeting.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Cahciua in front of Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_005<tab>Had enough rest, have you? Then let's round up everyone!
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_010<tab>During your confrontation with him, Zoraal Ja bade Wuk Lamat come to the tower's summit.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_011<tab>Problem is, the elevators have been locked down due to the state of emergency.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_SHALE_000_012<tab>We've been working to lift the access restrictions, but frankly it's not looking promising.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_WUKLAMAT_000_013<tab>Are there any other ways we can get to Zoraal Ja?
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_014<tab>We believe so.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_015<tab>As you know, Solution Nine occupies Everkeep's ninth level.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_016<tab>The summit, meanwhile, is the twelfth.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_ALISAIE_000_017<tab>The map appears to be cut off.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_SHALE_000_018<tab>While the king and queen's residence is believed to be located there, the details are highly classified. Hence the lack of map data.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_019<tab>We do, however, have reliable intelligence concerning everything up to the eleventh level.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_GRAHATIA_000_020<tab>What is this place?
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_021<tab>That is Origenics, the facility where souls are separated and refined for use.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_022<tab>The process begins at the base with the extraction of souls from regulators and fiends.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_023<tab>Those souls are then transported up to the aetheric separator, where they are cleansed of memories.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_024<tab>Finally, they are packed within soul cells for distribution.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_GRAHATIA_000_025<tab>Twelve forfend... They've recreated the process by which souls are broken down in the aetherial sea...
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_026<tab>An affront to nature, I know, but ethical discussions must wait.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_027<tab>The salient point is that the facility extends vertically from the first to the eleventh level.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_028<tab>Now, if Zoraal Ja intends to strengthen himself with the people's souls, as we strongly suspect...
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_KRILE_000_029<tab>Then the facility will be operating to process and transport those souls directly to him─on the twelfth level!
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_KRILE_000_030<tab>So in order to reach Zoraal Ja, we make our way through Origenics!
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_031<tab>Precisely.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_032<tab>As the facility sustains the Alexandrian way of life, security will be extremely tight.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_033<tab>But if you are willing to brave the route, we'll back you up as best we can. What say you?
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_WUKLAMAT_000_034<tab>It goes without saying that we're going!
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_035<tab><chuckle> I never had any doubt.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_036<tab>I'm coming too. You'll need guidance on-site, and this body makes me best suited.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_ERENVILLE_000_037<tab>...Hold it. Before you set off, I have to ask.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_ERENVILLE_000_038<tab>All this time, you've known that Sphene is an Endless, haven't you?
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_039<tab>Yes, we have.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_ERENVILLE_000_040<tab>Why didn't you tell us?

TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_041<tab>Honestly...it didn't seem relevant to the matters at hand? More complicated to explain than it was worth, and a distraction from our efforts to deal with Zoraal Ja.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_042<tab>Speaking of which, we should get moving. Those who are sallying forth, we gather in front of the tower!
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_043<tab>We can count on you to provide support from here, yes?
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_ERENVILLE_000_044<tab>...Of course.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_ERENVILLE_000_050<tab>I need to talk to you about... Never mind. It can wait.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_ERENVILLE_000_051<tab>Lest you wonder, I have no objections to remaining here. Someone needs to keep those in Tuliyollal informed.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_ERENVILLE_000_052<tab>Best of luck to you.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_WUKLAMAT_000_060<tab>Zoraal Ja is no king. Not anymore. For the sake of Tuliyollal─of the world─we must put an end to his madness.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>I've spoken with Alphinaud. Apparently, the dragons came to Tuliyollal's aid!
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_KRILE_000_070<tab>I'm coming too, of course. This is what I've worked so hard to be a part of.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_GRAHATIA_000_075<tab>The summit of Everkeep... Finally, we shall see what the clouds conceal.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_080<tab>All present and accounted for? Excellent.
TEXT_KINGME113_04944_CAHCIUA_000_081<tab>We make for the summit in one push. This will be a grueling climb, so see to it you spare no preparation.
